languages.text: На внутренней стороне начертано: "Сколь ни целил в сердце Мерагона враг Человечества — останавливал сей щит смертоносное жало супостата, ибо Бог-Император хранит верных слуг Своих от смерти алчущей".

traits.locale_text: На внутренней стороне начертано: "Сколь ни целил в сердце Мерагона враг Человечества — останавливал сей щит смертоносное жало супостата, ибо Бог-Император хранит верных слуг Своих от смерти алчущей".

languages.text: An inscription on the inner side reads: "Many an enemy of Humankind took aim at Meragon's heart, yet this shield stopped each foe's deadly sting, for the God-Emperor protects His faithful servants from death's rapacity."
languages.original_text: На внутренней стороне начертано: "Сколь ни целил в сердце Мерагона враг Человечества — останавливал сей щит смертоносное жало супостата, ибо Бог-Император хранит верных слуг Своих от смерти алчущей".

An inscription on the inner side reads: "Many an enemy of Humankind took aim at Meragon's heart, yet this shield stopped each foe's deadly sting, for the God-Emperor protects His faithful servants from death's rapacity."

languages.text: Eine Inschrift auf der Innenseite lautet: "Viele Gegner der Menschheit haben Meragons Herz anvisiert, doch sein Schild hielt den tödlichen Stich jedes Gegners auf, denn der Gottimperator schützt Seine treuen Diener vor dem Hunger des Todes."
languages.original_text: An inscription on the inner side reads: "Many an enemy of Humankind took aim at Meragon's heart, yet this shield stopped each foe's deadly sting, for the God-Emperor protects His faithful servants from death's rapacity."

traits.locale_text: Eine Inschrift auf der Innenseite lautet: "Viele Gegner der Menschheit haben Meragons Herz anvisiert, doch sein Schild hielt den tödlichen Stich jedes Gegners auf, denn der Gottimperator schützt Seine treuen Diener vor dem Hunger des Todes."

languages.text: Sur le revers, on peut lire : « Nombre des ennemis de l'humanité ont tenté de percer le cœur de Meragon, mais ce bouclier l'a toujours gardé de leurs attaques, car l'Empereur-Dieu protège Ses fidèles serviteurs de la voracité de la mort. »
languages.original_text: An inscription on the inner side reads: "Many an enemy of Humankind took aim at Meragon's heart, yet this shield stopped each foe's deadly sting, for the God-Emperor protects His faithful servants from death's rapacity."

traits.locale_text: Sur le revers, on peut lire : « Nombre des ennemis de l'humanité ont tenté de percer le cœur de Meragon, mais ce bouclier l'a toujours gardé de leurs attaques, car l'Empereur-Dieu protège Ses fidèles serviteurs de la voracité de la mort. »

languages.text: 这面盾牌内侧刻着这样的铭文：“众多人类之敌瞄准了梅拉贡的心脏，但这面盾牌挡住了那些致命的攻击，因为神皇会庇护祂的忠仆，让他们幸免于难。”
languages.original_text: An inscription on the inner side reads: "Many an enemy of Humankind took aim at Meragon's heart, yet this shield stopped each foe's deadly sting, for the God-Emperor protects His faithful servants from death's rapacity."

traits.locale_text: 这面盾牌内侧刻着这样的铭文：“众多人类之敌瞄准了梅拉贡的心脏，但这面盾牌挡住了那些致命的攻击，因为神皇会庇护祂的忠仆，让他们幸免于难。”
这面盾牌内侧刻着这样的铭文：“许多人类之敌瞄准了梅拉贡的心脏，但这面盾牌挡住了那些致命的攻击，因为神皇会庇护祂的忠仆，让他们幸免于难。”

languages.text: Una inscripción en la cara interna reza: «Muchos enemigos de la Humanidad apuntaron al corazón de Meragon, pero su escudo detuvo el aguijonazo letal de todos ellos, pues el Dios Emperador protege a Sus fieles sirvientes de la voracidad de la muerte».
languages.original_text: An inscription on the inner side reads: "Many an enemy of Humankind took aim at Meragon's heart, yet this shield stopped each foe's deadly sting, for the God-Emperor protects His faithful servants from death's rapacity."

traits.locale_text: Una inscripción en la cara interna reza: «Muchos enemigos de la Humanidad apuntaron al corazón de Meragon, pero su escudo detuvo el aguijonazo letal de todos ellos, pues el Dios Emperador protege a Sus fieles sirvientes de la voracidad de la muerte».

languages.text: 内側にはこう刻まれている。「多くの人類の敵がメラゴンの心臓を狙ったが、この盾は敵の致命の一撃をすべて防いだ。なぜなら神帝陛下は、その忠実な僕たちを死の貪欲から守るからである」
languages.original_text: An inscription on the inner side reads: "Many an enemy of Humankind took aim at Meragon's heart, yet this shield stopped each foe's deadly sting, for the God-Emperor protects His faithful servants from death's rapacity."

traits.locale_text: 内側にはこう刻まれている。「多くの人類の敵がメラゴンの心臓を狙ったが、この盾は敵の致命の一撃をすべて防いだ。なぜなら神帝陛下は、その忠実な僕たちを死の貪欲から守るからである」

languages.text: Kalkanın iç yüzüne kazınmış yazıt: "İnsanlığın nice düşmanı Meragon'un yüreğine nişan aldıysa da bu kalkan, her öldürücü dar­beyi geri püskürttü zira Tanrı İmparator sadık kullarını ecelin pençesinden esirger."
languages.original_text: An inscription on the inner side reads: "Many an enemy of Humankind took aim at Meragon's heart, yet this shield stopped each foe's deadly sting, for the God-Emperor protects His faithful servants from death's rapacity."

traits.locale_text: Kalkanın iç yüzüne kazınmış yazıt: "İnsanlığın nice düşmanı Meragon'un yüreğine nişan aldıysa da bu kalkan, her öldürücü dar­beyi geri püskürttü zira Tanrı İmparator sadık kullarını ecelin pençesinden esirger."
